pkgmetadata.longdescription: # info-clustering[![Travis](https://api.travis-ci.com/zhaofeng-shu33/info-clustering-python-binding.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/zhaofeng-shu33/info-clustering-python-binding)[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/info-cluster.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/info-cluster)## Usage```shellpip install info-cluster```After installing `info-cluster` package, you can use it as follows:```Pythonfrom info_cluster import InfoClusterimport networkx as nxg = nx.Graph() # undirected graphg.add_edge(0, 1, weight=1)g.add_edge(1, 2, weight=1)g.add_edge(0, 2, weight=5)ic = InfoCluster(affinity='precomputed') # use precomputed graph structureic.fit(g)ic.print_hierarchical_tree()```The output is like```shell /-0 /-|--| \-2 | \-1```
